import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import axios from '../../axios-orders'; function SelectionFrom({route, value}) { const bookingData = useState({ route: 'urbananana', name: 'jimmu de', numOfKayaks: 'you did not pick any', timeOfDay: 'you did not select any', }); const postDataHandler = () => { console.log('was clicked'); const booking = { routePicked: bookingData[0].route, name: bookingData[0].name, date: value, } axios.post('/bookings.json', booking) .then(response => console.log(response)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } const settingNameHandler = (e) => { bookingData[1]({name: e.target.value}) } return (

{route} on {value.format("DD")} of {value.format("MMMM")}

 Name settingNameHandler(e)} /> Number of Kayaks Start Time {/* */}
) } export default SelectionFrom;
